import "../index.scss" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import Github from '../assets/icon/whiteGithub.png'; import Web from '../assets/icon/web.png'; function Card({picture, text, outils, description, GithubLink, WebLink}) { if (WebLink === "") { document.getElementById("web").style.display = "none" } return (

{ description }

Langages

{ text }

Outils

{ outils }

) } Card.propTypes = { picture: PropTypes.string, text: PropTypes.string, outils: PropTypes.string, description: PropTypes.string } export default Card
